About Me

Getting to know Sam...

Background

I am an accountant, turned software engineer. I started off my career in Tax Compliance, assisting large hedge funds and PE clients with their tax concerns. I soon realized a lot of the work being done was quite repetitive and could be done in a more efficient manner. I then had the chance to work in the Quantitative solutions group, where I learned the ETL tool, Alteryx. After using Alteryx, I decided to teach myself how to program. I then started taking courses at community colleges, MOOCs,youtube and the school of hard knocks aka building my own projects.

PricewaterhouseCoopers

Full Stack Developer

Developed a greenfield app that used .Net and Angular technologies.The tool was able to parse through large amounts of data and to improve efficiency for our clients by 50%.The time savings lead to profit increases for the product line.

Events (Stealth mode startup)

Working on Machine learning aspects of the project. Building models to enhance the user experience and ensure the user has a more personalized experience.

Building a React application that will allow adoption agencies to post dogs available for adoption as well as letting users see what dogs are available in their area. Linking dogs in need with humans that care.
